SEARCH
Package access.enquiry

Class EnquiryHandler

java.lang.Object
access.enquiry.EnquiryHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicantEnquiryFeatures, ManagerEnquiryFeatures, OfficerEnquiryFeatures
public class EnquiryHandler extends Object implements ManagerEnquiryFeatures, OfficerEnquiryFeatures, ApplicantEnquiryFeatures
Handles all enquiry-related operations in the BTO Management System. Implements interfaces for managers, officers, and applicants to provide role-appropriate access to enquiry functionality and data.

    • replyEnquiry

      public void replyEnquiry(String enquiryId, String reply)
      Adds a reply to an enquiry. Available to managers to respond to applicant enquiries.
      Specified by:
      replyEnquiry in interface ManagerEnquiryFeatures
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      reply - The reply message text
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the enquiry is not found

    • addReply

      public void addReply(String enquiryId, String reply, String responderNric)
      Adds a reply to an enquiry with the responder's NRIC. Supports accountability by tracking who responded.
      Specified by:
      addReply in interface ManagerEnquiryFeatures
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      reply - The reply message text
      responderNric - The NRIC of the user adding the reply
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the enquiry is not found

    • editReply

      public void editReply(String enquiryId, int replyIndex, String newReplyText)
      Edits a specific reply in an enquiry conversation.
      Specified by:
      editReply in interface ManagerEnquiryFeatures
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry containing the reply
      replyIndex - The index of the reply to edit
      newReplyText - The new text for the reply
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the enquiry is not found

    • editEnquiry

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • saveChanges

      public void saveChanges()
      Saves current enquiry data to persistent storage. Called after operations that modify enquiry data.

    • findEnquiryById

      private Enquiry findEnquiryById(String enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry by its ID. Helper method used by various public methods that require finding specific enquiries.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to find
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • generateUniqueId

      private String generateUniqueId(String prefix)
      Generates a unique ID for a new enquiry. Creates IDs in the format: [prefix]-[timestamp] to ensure uniqueness.
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix to use for the ID (e.g., "ENQ")
      Returns:
      A unique ID string
